name: Firepower (itch) (backwardspy)
description:
A weak, under-powered battle robot uses parts dropped by its opponents to build an arsenal of weapons in a quest to become the most powerful killing machine possible.

Firepower was built in a week for olcCodeJam2020 to the theme "The Great Machine."

Use WASD to move and the mouse to aim and shoot.

Please leave a comment and let me know what you think!
